node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月初至 5 月 10 日曾到英國。在英國同住的家人於 3 月 27 日確診，患者於 4 月 8 日有氣促病徵，曾接受英國醫療人員上門檢查，但因病徵不嚴重，未有進行病毒測試。5 月 10 日乘坐 CX252 航班從英國返港，返港時並無病徵，由亞洲博覽館送院。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the UK between early February and May 10. Her family members, whom she lives with, were diagnosed positive for the virus. The patient experienced breathing difficulty on April 8 and was examined by NHS practitioners at home; however she was not tested for the virus by then as the symptoms were deemed not severe. On May 10 she returned to Hong Kong on flight CX252, exhibited no symptoms by then, and was hospitalised from AsiaWorld-Expo.

node.remarks_en: Travelled to the United Kingdom in early Feb
